long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Messaging Assistant can help you with:
- Generating replies in WhatsApp conversations (shortcut: CTRL + Q)
- Rewriting selected text to sound better and more consice (shortcut: ALR + R )

Generating replies in WhatsApp conversations:
- You can generated messages using shortcut (CTRL + Q)
- You can turn on auto-generation is extension's settings 

Rewriting selected text:
- You can rewrite selected text using shortcut (ALT + R)
- You can rewrite selected text by pressing right click and then "Rewrite Selected Text"

Optimized for English. Works for other languages as well.

Privacy Notice: We don't store or read any of your data. We don't even have a backend. We directly communicate with OpenAI API.
